item.title: Lyft and Chinaâ€™s Baidu look to bring robotaxis to Europe next year
item.description: The companies want to launch the robotaxi services in Germany and the U.K. first, pending regulatory approval.

item.title: Google removes over 50 DEI groups from a list of groups it helps fund
item.description: Google removed the name of 58 DEI groups from its list, including the Latino Leadership Alliance and the ACLU of Illinois.

item.title: 8 Best Handheld Gaming Consoles (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The second golden age of portable gaming is here. These are the top gadgets for taking your video games on the go.

item.title: Spotify raises subscription prices
item.description: Spotify is raising prices for users in some international markets after a rough quarterly earnings report.

item.title: Amazon shuts down Wondery podcast studio, cuts 110 jobs
item.description: Despite securing big names in the business, the company is now shifting its strategy in an effort to better compete with rivals like Spotify and YouTu...
